name: Shattered Glass (Asnkngt)
description:
A jigsaw puzzle game with animated 3D scenes.

Currently, this is a demo with a single scene to showcase the custom rendering and core gameplay.

Controls (the first two are important to have a less frustrating experience)

  • Right-click to freeze piece in place
  • P to pause and unpause scene animations
  • Left-click to drag camera and select pieces
  • Mouse scroll to adjust distance
  • WASDQE to rotate
  • Space and Left Shift to control camera height

Note: build is currently only in fullscreen (Use alt + tab to get out). Will implement resizable windows later.
